title: Chithirai Nela Lyrics Kadal Songs Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Chithirai Nela
Singer : Vijay Yesudas
Lyrics: Vairamuthu
MOvie: Kadal
Music: AR Rahman

Chithirai => the first month of the Tamil year or calender .Other Songs Lyrics
1. Nenjukulle - in tamil english
2. Eley Keehen
3. Adiye Adiye
4. Moongil Thottam
5. Chithirai Nela
6. Magudi Magudi
Lyrics in Thanglish
Exact translation of tamil words
Chithirai Nela, orey nela
parandha vaano, padacha kadavulu
yellaamey othayila nikudhudey
nee kooda othayila nikkuradey
ettu vai makkaa
ettu vachu aagaasam thottuvai makkaa (2)

Manidhan ninaithaal vazhi pirkkum
manadhilirundhu ozhi pirakkum
pudhaikindra vidhayum
muyarchi kondaalthaan
boomiyum kooda thazh thirakkum

ettu vai makkaa
ettu vachu aagaasam thottuvai makkaa

Kannagalil irundhey kaatchigal thondrum
kalangalil irundhey dhesangal thondrum
thuyarathil irundhey kaaviyam thondrum
thozhviyil irundhey niyanangal thondrum

Sooriyan maraindhaal vizhakondru sirikkum
thonigal kavildhaal kilai ondru kidaikum

Chithirai Nela, orey nela
ettu vai makkaa
ettu vachu aagaasam thottuvai makkaa

Maram ondru vilundhaal ,
marupadi thazhaikkum.
manam indri villundhaal ,
yaar solli nadakum.
boomiyai thirandhaal ,
pudhayaalum irukkum.
pookalai thirandhaal ,
thaenthuli irukkum.

Chithirai Nela, orey nela
Chithirai Nela, orey nela
adho adho orey nela.. English Translation
I tried my best :)
Chithirai Moon, only one moon
widespread sky, created GOD
everything is standing alone, child,
you too standing alone, child
try walking child
walk to touch the sky, child (2)

if human decides, a way will open
a light will come from mind.
only if a seeded seed try
to come up,
earth will open doors for it.

try walking, child
walk to touch the sky, child

seen will raise from eyes
countryâ€™s will appear from battle field
poem will appear from affliction

if sunsets, a lamp will laugh
if a raft submerge,we will get a branch

Chithirai Moon, only one moon
try walking child
walk to touch the sky, child (2)

if a tree falls,
it will bloom again.
if we fall depressed,
how it will raise to walk?
if Earth is opened ,
treasure will be there.
if flowers are opened,
honey will be there.

if river is opened,
every living being will live.
if tomorrow is opened,
self confidence will raise.

Chithirai Moon, only one moon

there, there .. only one moon
